# latestAnchors

**Instance Property**

The most recent hand anchors for each hand.

## Declaration

```swift
final var latestAnchors: (leftHand: HandAnchor?, rightHand: HandAnchor?) { get }
```

## Discussion

Accessing this tuple consumes its values and sets them to `nil` until the next anchor update. Both elements of this tuple are `nil` when the associated [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/HandTrackingProvider] isn’t running.

## Observing hand anchor data

- **anchorUpdates**: A sequence of updates for all hands that a provider tracks.
